DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , 20-subject , investigator-blinded study evaluate effect Mederma N & I Mederma Ultra Gel appearance post-surgical scar .
DOC.brief_title: Mederma Reduce Appearance Post Surgical Scars
DOC.detailed_description: This 10-week research study design compare effect two gel appearance post surgical scar chest and/or back . The subject ask identify two symmetrical skin growth would like remove : one leave chest and/or back one right chest and/or back . Additionally , subject identify third skin growth would like remove reasonable distance two symmetrical skin growth locate either back chest . Inclusion Criteria : - Healthy male non pregnant female subject â‰¥18 year age - seborrheic keratoses right leave chest and/or back Exclusion Criteria : -Subjects know allergy sensitivity ingredient contain test product include onion extract Lidocaine .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must 1870 year age , race sex . Subjects must Fitzpatrick skin type IVI . Subjects must two symmetrical upper chest and/or back seborrheic keratoses opinion investigator good candidate study . Subjects know allergy sensitivity ingredient contain test product include onion extract Lidocaine . Subjects know history keloid hypertrophic scar .
